narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Children's Specialty Group, Inc. is a Dentist, Pediatric Dentistry provider based in Milwaukee, WI. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $10.4M in Medicaid payments across 183K claims serving 0 beneficiaries.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $10.4M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
